short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A joke generator aims to kill you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Joker Dad makes your day. 

Every time you open a new tab in chrome, you will see a random joke. Did you hate it? No worries ! By clicking generate button (icon), you will see another joke. 

If you aim to find a joke that includes a specific term, you have a searchbar to do it.

Joker Dad has clean UI with readable typography and fresh colors.
